data.text: Test Your Building Skills To Earn Money
Test Your Building Skills To Earn Money
Play over 60+ Games and Win Cash!

description: Build Up is a puzzle game that uses a three-dimensional playing area as opposed to the traditional two-dimensional area used in other versions of Tetris. The objective of the game is to go on stacking 3D blocks on top of each other, and as compactly as possible so that the tower height does not go over the specified limit. This fun game tests your vision and reaction time, and is one of the most played online games on the vpl Platform.
Build Up is available only on the vpl platform, where you can play games and earn real cash too. Battle it out with multiple players online and transfer your winnings instantly to your account.
Build Up is a puzzle game that uses a three-dimensional playing area as opposed to the traditional two-dimensional area used in other versions of Tetris.

data.header: Features of the Build Up game

description: Blocks are generated at every turn and keep falling down towards the base. Unlike the standard Tetris games where the player is allowed to change the orientation of the falling blocks, this game allows the player to rotate the base to make the block fall in a suitable place.
When a ‘level’ is covpletely filled with blocks, it disappears and contributes to the score of the player. The score made by the player determines the amount of money the player is eligible to win.

Blocks are generated at every turn and keep falling down towards the base. Unlike the standard Tetris games where the player is allowed to change the orientation of the falling blocks, this game allows the player to rotate the base to make the block fall in a suitable place.

data.header: How to Build Up Online with vpl

description: This puzzle game starts with a user-controlled rotating platform which has a placement area at the centre to hold the blocks that fall from the top. The main objective of the game is to successfully form 9-block layers, which then vanish, allowing the upper blocks to move down.

To place these blocks, you need to rotate the platform by swiping left or right so that they fit correctly in the empty spaces. The falling blocks come down at a very slow speed, giving you enough time to think about where to place them. Once you are confident about where to place the block, you can go ahead and tap on the screen to make it fall faster.

data.header: Steps to play Build Up game on vpl

steps.title: STEP 4

steps.title: STEP 6

data.header: The Build Up Game will end if

description: You cross the warning height. Sivple, right? Put your skills to the test in vpl Build Up and win real cash online.

The game supports both tournament and battle formats. In the tournament format, the player’s objective is to get the best high score by the time the tournament ends. You can also play live against another online player. In this format, the objective is to last longer than your opponent. The game supports playing against up to 4 players at the same time.

data.header: The Maximum Amount Players can Win in Build Up game

description: On a typical day, there are players who win more than ₹25,000 per day in Build Up. It is possible for skilled players to win more than ₹50,000 to ₹60,000 per day as well.

content.name: Why am I suddenly not able to rotate my base to control where the block falls?
description: This happens when the block has fallen so low that rotating the base will make the tower clash with the falling block. This means that you will not be able to control the base anymore till the next block is generated. You should try to adjust the position of the base before this happens.

content.name: What is the best way to increase my score as fast as possible in the game?
description: The game has multipliers which enable players to increase their score at a faster rate than their opponents. Clearing more than one layer in a single turn multiplies your score by a factor proportional to the number of layers cleared. Scoring these combos will help you increase your score quickly.

content.name: Does the game end when I clear all the blocks present on the base?
description: No. The only scenario where your game ends is when the height of the tower crosses the warning height that is shown in the game, or when you score more than your opponent and your opponent has finished his game before you.
